mapper.insert: insert into myboard(seq, title, writer, content) values((select nvl(max(seq), 0)+1 from myboard), #{title}, #{writer},#{content})
mapper.update: update myboard set title=#{title},content=#{content} where seq=#{seq}
mapper.select: select * from myboard where title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
select * from myboard where CONTENT like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' order by seq desc
